---
title: "Ham cooking"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
# Packages
library("dplyr")
library("ggplot2")
```

```{r}
# Read data
raw_data <- read.table("raw_data", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

# Add new time column: minutes after ham was removed from the fridge
time_format = "%H:%M"
time_out_of_fridge <- strptime("6:14", format=time_format)

data <- mutate(
  raw_data,
  minutes = difftime(
    strptime((time), format=time_format),
    time_out_of_fridge,
    units="mins",
  )
)
```

```{r}
# Plot
ggplot(
  data,
  aes(as.numeric(minutes), temperature)
) + geom_point()
```
